headline: 3 Reasons to Sell SHW and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since August 2025, Sherwin-Williams has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 0.6% while floating around $365.78. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 6.7% gain during that period.
